content: center pulling tightly you ll now have 4 ribs that make a + shape repeat the process 4 more times in between the 4 ribs this will give you the 8 ribs of your pumpkin hanger with black starting with a 6 tail chain 20 cut yarn leaving a 6 tail thread one tail onto your needle and thread the chain through the ghostie from top to bottom repeat for the pumpkin make sure there are at least 5 chains pulled through the bottom of both ghostie and pumpkin knot the ends of the chain and pull the chain back inside until the knots are inside the ghostie and pumpkin the pumpkin bottom can be really tight so be careful not to pull the chain too much you can trim the remaining tails or just weave them into the body and pumpkin all done i really hope that you enjoyed making your very own ghostie pumpkin hanger i d love to see your finished makes so if you share them on social media please tag me so i can see it if you have any questions feel free to contact me on ig @wild tulip crochet and i ll be happy to help ghostie pumpkin hanger is protected by copyright ©wild tulip crochet 2024
